item.description: About Me I am a cybersecurity enthusiast, primarily interested in web and hardware. I enjoy developing open source projects, treating it as a fun activity. In my free time, I mainly ride my skateboard and read booksâ€¦ I’m trying to regularly upload videos on YouTube and Odysee Talks Year City Conference Title Slides Video soon … Open Source Projects Project GitHub qrack https://github.com/qrxnz/qrack

Table of contents nixos network bridges tools hydra ssh netexec smb ftp ldap bloodhound mssql powershell scripts decode base64 open ports hardware RP 2040 list of useful firmware nixos network bridges Example: networking.interfaces.eno1.useDHCP = true; networking.interfaces.virbr0.useDHCP = true; networking.bridges = { "virbr0" = { interfaces = [ "eno1" ]; }; }; If you use a firewall, also remember to add your interface to a trust group: networking.firewall.trustedInterfaces = [ "virbr0" ]; tools hydra ssh hydra -v -V -u -l {Username} -P {Big_Passwordlist} -t 1 {IP} ssh netexec smb initial enumeration netexec smb target null authentication netexec smb target -u '' -p '' guest authentication netexec smb target -u 'guest' -p '' list shares netexec smb target -u '' -p '' --shares netexec smb target -u username -p password --shares list usernames netexec smb target -u '' -p '' --users netexec smb target -u '' -p '' --rid-brute netexec smb target -u username -p password --users local authentication netexec smb target -u username -p password --local-auth using kerberos netexec smb target -u username -p password -k password spray netexec smb target -u users.
